Thank you All Uniform Wear for coming out today to get our web store launched!

It's officially the back-to-school season - buy your uniforms at http://www.alluniformwear.com/

See our picture for uniform requirements.

To purchase uniforms please visit ALLUNIFORMWEAR at http://www.alluniformwear.com/

Go to the "SCHOOL" section and find Lone Star Language Academy and you will be directed to the web store. All approved uniforms are on the site.

We invite you to the school campus to view the selections and sizes of the uniforms.

We will have early morning and late evenings to accommodate all schedules.

Once you have viewed the uniforms, I encourage you to immediately make your online order to ensure your child's uniforms arrive prior to the start of school, as it is mandatory for all students to wear uniforms.
